column5: Any suggestions on a good fishing location with camping?  Georgian bay area?  I'm dreaming about a week in the summer.
My wife had the idea of going to Bruce Peninsula this year for camping...  I LOVE THE IDEA!  Georgian Bay area!!
Massassauga Provincial Park, Moon River area of Georgian Bay.
Bruce national park is nice.I caught my biggest pickerel there for the peninsula area.From shore and lots of bass also.
I good friend of mine has campsites and boat rentals on Lake Nipissing...  check out www.lakair.com
Hey Kevin, what's the dude's name...   I might know him.
I've said it efore and I'll say it again... French River Provincial Park... just north of Moon River... canoe through the "figure 8" and head out onto GBay... spectacular!
i agree, the french river is my favourite place within 4 hours from home.
thanks guys.  I'll look them all over.
Hey Kevin... Like Roy said we think we might just know this dude...
Too bad this place ain't on the West Arm or I'd check it out   I'd 2nd or 3rd or 4th or whatever, the French River area. My wife and I have been going there for many years. Unbeatable country.
